posts.post_content: Looking for 5 Ramly cards--Boverman, Elberfield, Gessler, Milan, and Walter Johnson---looking for grades from 1 to 3---thanks,  Don

Tough group..

I have an Elberfeld in a 4, I know it's a bit higher than sought, but it is pretty tough another might not come along for awhile.

$375 delivered. The diagonal line appears to be on the card as made.


Scott
